attributes.action: investigate the decision by the BBC and other UK television providers not to screen the appeal by the Disasters Emergency Committee for the Gaza crisis relief fund. The British public has an absolute right to be made aware of the appeal and such censorship has to be questioned and, if necessary, condemned.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: I am a pensioner, but I wanted to make a contribution to the innocent frightened children in Gaza. Yet I had to learn from Aljazeera that the British media were boycotting the appeal from one of the most respected charitable groups in the world. I resent this shameful censorship. Please also contact your MP directly.  The need urgent.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
